definition: elegiac couplet
variant of 挽[wan3]/to draw (a cart)/to lament the dead
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: This is an abyss, between the sheets, pale white like an elegiac couplet.
sentences.chinese: 這是深淵，在枕褥之間，輓聯般蒼白。

definition: to praise
to spread/to hand down/to disseminate

Huanghuagang (Chrysanthemum Hill) in Guangzhou, scene of disastrous uprising of 23rd April 1911
